mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OPT_MEMBER ORDER BY OPT_NO_SEQ
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OPT_PAYMENT P, OPT_MEMBER M WHERE P.OPT_NO_SEQ = M.OPT_NO_SEQ AND P.OPT_NO_SEQ = #{num}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OPT_COUPON C, OPT_MEMBER M WHERE C.OPT_NO_SEQ = M.OPT_NO_SEQ AND C.OPT_NO_SEQ = #{num}

SELECT R , PAY_DATE , NAME , PAY_ALL FROM(SELECT ROWNUM R, PAY_DATE ,I.ITEM_NAME NAME, I.ITEM_PRICE * P.PAY_COUNT PAY_ALL FROM OPT_PAYMENT P , OPT_ITEM I , OPT_MEMBER M WHERE M.OPT_NO_SEQ = P.OPT_NO_SEQ AND P.ITEM_NUM_SEQ = I.ITEM_NUM_SEQ AND M.OPT_NO_SEQ = #{no}) ORDER BY R DESC
SELECT * FROM OPT_ITEM ORDER BY ITEM_NUM_SEQ
SELECT * FROM OPT_PAYMENT ORDER BY PAY_SEQ

SELECT R, ITEM_NUM_SEQ, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_VIEWS_NO, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_URL FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS R, ITEM_NUM_SEQ, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_VIEWS_NO, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_URL FROM(SELECT ITEM_NUM_SEQ, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_VIEWS_NO, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_URL FROM OPT_ITEM ORDER BY ITEM_NUM_SEQ DESC)) WHERE R BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM OPT_ITEM
ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{msg}||'%'
ITEM_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{msg}||'%'
ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{msg}||'%' or ITEM_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{msg}||'%'
ORDER BY ITEM_NUM_SEQ DESC
